titleStmt.title: Look about you, for the devil that you fear is in you, or, The right devil unfolded in his descent, form, education, qualification, place and nature of torment : with many other divine secrets, never from the beginning yet extant till this last witness, so beneficial both for the seed of gain, and the seed of faith / written by Laur. Claxton.
titleStmt.author: Claxton, Laurence, 1615-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by William Learner ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
